entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
